name: usb-log

GET.summary:
Retrieve information about connected USB drives, including estimated log sizes.
Access Group: sysgrp.cfg

help: Retrieve information about connected USB drives, including estimated log sizes.

usb_attached.name: usb_attached
usb_attached.title: USB Connected
usb_attached.description: True when a USB device is connected.

max_usb_filename_length.name: max_usb_filename_length
max_usb_filename_length.title: Max Filename Length
max_usb_filename_length.description: Maximum length for a USB filename.

auto_install_image.name: auto_install_image
auto_install_image.title: Auto Install Image
auto_install_image.description: True if the auto install image file on USB is set and valid.

auto_install_conf.name: auto_install_conf
auto_install_conf.title: Auto Install Conf
auto_install_conf.description: True if the auto load config file on USB is set.

avail_space.name: avail_space
avail_space.title: Free Space
avail_space.description: Bytes of free space available on the USB.

same_vdom.name: same_vdom
same_vdom.title: Is Backing up Current VDOM
same_vdom.description: True if the backup is for the current VDOM.

is_copying.name: is_copying
is_copying.title: Is Backing Up
is_copying.description: True if there is an ongoing backup.

log_size.name: log_size
log_size.title: Backup Log Size
log_size.description: The log size of the current backup in bytes.

log_file_no.name: log_file_no
log_file_no.title: Log File Count
log_file_no.description: The total count of files being backed up.

response_description: Retrieve information about connected USB drives and estimated log sizes.
